text: Anice Wismer Johnson (February 22, 1919 – January 22, 1992) is a former member of the Ohio Senate. She represented the 18th District, which encompassed much of Northeastern Ohio. She served from 1973 to 1975.Sen. Anice Johnson (R-Kent) Prior to this, she was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives. ==External links== *Profile on the Ohio Ladies Gallery website ==References== Category:Ohio state senators Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:Ohio Republicans Category:Women state legislators in Ohio Category:1919 births Category:1992 deaths Category:20th-century American politicians Category:20th- century American women politicians
title: Anice Johnson
